system.sustained: Daemon selects target in range, dealing 1d10 Energy Damage with Pen 5, +1d10 Energy Damage per two degrees of Success. Any creature affected by this power also makes +0 Toughness Test, if failed, they gain 1d5 Corruption, +1d5 per Degree of Failiure. Targets that fail by 5+ Degress of Failiure irreversably and catastrophically mutate into a Chaos Spawn, effectively being killed instantly. Characters with fate points may burn them to avoid this fate.
